name: Kobuki
body:
### Introduction

Kobuki documentation is located in several places - this domain hosts only the software driver documentation. This should be of interest if you are either

* Compiling or cross-compiling the c++ driver and building your own implementation on top.
* Developing the c++ driver itself.
* Writing a non-c++ driver implementation for kobuki.

If you are one of these users, head straight to the [doxygen](doxygen/index.html). Guides and api documentation can be found therein.

### Other Documentation Sources

For other sources of documentation:

* [Official Kobuki Home](http://kobuki.yujinrobot.com) - about, sales, specifications and hardware howtos.
* [Ros Documentation](http://ros.org/wiki/kobuki) - kobuki in Ros.
* [Turtlebot Documentation](http://ros.org/wiki/Robots/TurtleBot) - a full reference platform implementation for kobuki.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
